title: Git Configuration for Automated Backups
description: Configure Git for automated backups of the AI Lab Framework project. This includes setting up remote repositories and ensuring proper authentication.
acceptance_criteria: Git is configured to push changes to a remote repository.
Automated backup mechanism is in place (e.g., a script that commits and pushes).
Authentication to the remote repository is secure.
notes: Consider using Git hooks or CI/CD pipelines for automation.
